name: SOULCALIBUR VI
description: Bring more than your fists to the fight! Featuring all-new battle mechanics and characters, SOULCALIBUR VI marks a new era of the historic franchise. Welcome back to the stage of history!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5 GHz or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
